bug.author: znation
bug.summary: SFrame.show has a giant weird tooltip
bug.description: Repro steps: import turicreate as tc sf = tc.SFrame.read_csv('https://docs-assets.developer.apple.com/turicreate/datasets/tc-clang-format-results.csv') sf.show() Expected: no giant weird tooltip Actual: See screenshot <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/38529519-09a9da0a-3c1a-11e8-821f-bd9b5fe7e5d5.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhishekpratapa>@abhishekpratapa</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> just did a repro and while the giant weird tooltips are gone, I see this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/38603524-bd485ccc-3d22-11e8-9479-ae5a360410a6.png></denchmark-link>
EDIT: This is a known tracked issue, closing this issue.
